Applied Neuroimaging fMRI Mini-Course 2010


This collection organizes all available talks given during the 2010 Applied Neuroimaging fMRI Mini-Course.

Talks

This section lists Applied Neuroimaging fMRI Mini-Course 2010 standalone talks by NISOx and NISOx collaborators.
  • Inference on SPMs: Random Field Theory & Alternatives
    Author: Thomas Nichols. 18th March 2010. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5492845.v1
  • FMRI Pre-Processing and ModelBased Statistics (2)
    Author: Thomas Nichols. 28th January 2010. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5492842.v1
  • FMRI Pre-Processing and ModelBased Statistics
    Author: Thomas Nichols. 14th January 2010. doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.5492767.v1
